title: 47 Tigers Die In Vietnam Zoos Due To H5N1 Bird Flu Virus: Report
content: Forty-seven tigers, three lions and a panther have died in zoos in south Vietnam due to the H5N1 bird flu virus, state media said Wednesday.
summary: Forty-seven tigers, three lions and a panther have died in zoos in south Vietnam due to the H5N1 bird flu virus, state media said Wednesday.

title: Diagnostic Errors Can Occur In 1 Out Of Every 14 Patients, New Study Shows
content: Diagnostic errors are likely to be occurring in as many as 1 in every 14 (7 per cent) hospital patients which requires new approaches to medical surveillance, a new study has stressed.
summary: Diagnostic errors are likely to be occurring in as many as 1 in every 14 (7 per cent) hospital patients which requires new approaches to medical surveillance, a new study has stressed.

title: Israel Strike Targets Beirut Southern Suburbs Again: Lebanon State Media
content: Lebanese official media said an Israeli strike Wednesday targeted Beirut's southern suburbs.
summary: Lebanese official media said an Israeli strike Wednesday targeted Beirut's southern suburbs.

title: Inside Israeli Ground Raids Against Lebanon's "Conquer The Galilee" Plan
content: Hezbollah is planning to replicate its own "October 7-style" attack on Israel to capture the northern Galilee region, the Israeli Defence Forces have claimed as they began ground incursions into the Hezbollah stronghold on Monday.
summary: Hezbollah is planning to replicate its own "October 7-style" attack on Israel to capture the northern Galilee region, the Israeli Defence Forces have claimed as they began ground incursions into the Hezbollah stronghold on Monday.

title: What Countries Are Doing To Rescue Nationals Out Of Lebanon Amid Conflict
content: Western nations are ramping up contingency plans to evacuate citizens from Lebanon after a sharp escalation in the conflict between Israel and the Lebanese armed movement Hezbollah, coupled with Iran's missile attack on Israel on Tuesday.
summary: Western nations are ramping up contingency plans to evacuate citizens from Lebanon after a sharp escalation in the conflict between Israel and the Lebanese armed movement Hezbollah, coupled with Iran's missile attack on Israel on Tuesday.

title: Fact Checking Who Said What In The Vance-Walz Veep Debate Ahead Of US Polls
content: Democrat Tim Walz and Republican JD Vance faced off in New York City on Tuesday night for their one and only vice-presidential debate, hosted by CBS News.
summary: Democrat Tim Walz and Republican JD Vance faced off in New York City on Tuesday night for their one and only vice-presidential debate, hosted by CBS News.

title: Video Shows Iran Launching Hundreds Of Ballistic Missiles At Israel
content: Iran launched a large-scale missile offensive against Israel - its second in the past seven months - Tuesday, targeting military bases in a strike dubbed 'Operation True Promise II'.
summary: Iran launched a large-scale missile offensive against Israel - its second in the past seven months - Tuesday, targeting military bases in a strike dubbed 'Operation True Promise II'.

title: Escalating Tensions In West Asia: India Calls For Restraint By All Sides
content: In its first reaction to fresh escalation of tensions in West Asia, India on Wednesday called for restraint by all sides and said the conflict must not take a wider regional dimension.
summary: In its first reaction to fresh escalation of tensions in West Asia, India on Wednesday called for restraint by all sides and said the conflict must not take a wider regional dimension.

title: Fact Check: Did Netanyahu Run Into A Bunker During Iran's Missile Attack?
content: Following Iran's massive rocket attack on Israel Tuesday night, video clips circulating on social media showed Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu allegedly running for cover inside a bunker.
summary: Following Iran's massive rocket attack on Israel Tuesday night, video clips circulating on social media showed Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu allegedly running for cover inside a bunker.

title: Over 100 People To Sue US Rapper Sean 'Diddy' Combs In Sex Assault Case
content: More than 100 people, including dozens of children, who say they were victims of rape, sexual assault and sexual exploitation at the hands of Sean "Diddy" Combs are to sue the US rap star, a lawyer said Tuesday.
summary: More than 100 people, including dozens of children, who say they were victims of rape, sexual assault and sexual exploitation at the hands of Sean "Diddy" Combs are to sue the US rap star, a lawyer said Tuesday.

title: How Successful Were Missile Attacks? What Iran And Israel Said
content: Iran launched a wave of missiles into Israel last evening to avenge the killing of top Hezbollah and Hamas leaders as the war in Middle East threatens to snowball into a larger regional conflict.

title: "Avoid Non-Essential Travel": India's Advisory Amid Iran-Israel Conflict
content: Indians have been asked to avoid travelling to Iran after they launched a massive missile attack on Israel while those already present in the country have been asked to stay vigilant.
summary: Indians have been asked to avoid travelling to Iran after they launched a massive missile attack on Israel while those already present in the country have been asked to stay vigilant.

title: Inside "True Promise II": What Changed In Iran's Latest Attack On Israel

title: Analysis: Yes, Calling Someone Mentally Disabled Causes Real Harm
content: In a recent speech, Donald Trump used the language of intelligence, or intellectual impairment, as a weapon against Kamala Harris. And he used similar language about Vice presidential candidate Tim Walz in a TV appearance.
summary: In a recent speech, Donald Trump used the language of intelligence, or intellectual impairment, as a weapon against Kamala Harris. And he used similar language about Vice presidential candidate Tim Walz in a TV appearance.

title: Did Trump Lose 2020 Election? His Veep Pick JD Vance Refuses To Say
content: Republican vice presidential candidate JD Vance has refused to acknowledge that Donald Trump lost the 2020 elections.
summary: Republican vice presidential candidate JD Vance has refused to acknowledge that Donald Trump lost the 2020 elections.

title: Who is JD Vance, The Republican Vice-Presidential Pick?
content: JD Vance is a politician, an author and a Marine veteran who has been serving as junior senator from Ohio.

title: Explained: What Is The Iron Dome, Israel's Anti-Missile Cover Since 2011
content: Israel's Iron Dome air defence system has intercepted thousands of rockets since it went into operation in 2011, providing the country with crucial cover during times of conflict.
summary: Israel's Iron Dome air defence system has intercepted thousands of rockets since it went into operation in 2011, providing the country with crucial cover during times of conflict.

title: India "Very Much" Concerned About Middle East Tensions: S Jaishankar
content: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar said on Tuesday that India is "very much" concerned at the possibility of broadening of the conflict in the Middle East.
summary: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar said on Tuesday that India is "very much" concerned at the possibility of broadening of the conflict in the Middle East.

title: Australian Man Held For Distributing App That Was 'Whatsapp For Criminals'
content: An Australian man has been charged with distributing the encrypted messaging app known as "Ghost", allegedly used by criminals across the globe to arrange drug deals and violence, police said Wednesday.
summary: An Australian man has been charged with distributing the encrypted messaging app known as "Ghost", allegedly used by criminals across the globe to arrange drug deals and violence, police said Wednesday.

title: Iran's Missile Capabilities Explained
content: Iran fired a salvo of ballistic missiles at Israel on Tuesday in retaliation for Israel's campaign against Tehran's Hezbollah allies in Lebanon, drawing on an array of weapons that has long worried the West.
